document.full_text: phil mickelson gave his preparations for next week's u.s. masters a timely boost by rocketing into a share of the lead in the third round of the houston open on saturday.
document.title: charging mickelson in tie for lead in houston
lines_and_colors: phil mickelson gave his preparations for next week's u.s. masters a timely boost by rocketing into a share of the lead in the third round of the houston open on saturday.
